Package org.somox.filter.tests

Class JUnitAnnotationTestDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.somox.filter.tests.JUnitAnnotationTestDetector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TestDetector
    public class JUnitAnnotationTestDetector
extends Object
implements TestDetector
    Detects a files containing a java class containing appropriate Annotations of JUnit as being a test file. This also applies to classes that extends such a class.

    Rationale

    JUnit is a framework solely used for testing purposes. The chosen annotations declare methods as either containing test logic or preparing tests. If a file contains such a method, it is a test file (see also the rationale in NotASourceFileTestDetector). Even if JUnit or a plugin contributing to it was analysed, production code would not be annotated with these annotations.

    The annotations that are being searched for are:

    • @Test
    • @Before
    • @BeforeClass
    • @After
    • @AfterClass

    Super classes are being searched because the information of these annotations are being inherited (If the parent class has a test method, the child also has it).

    • Method Detail

      • isTest

        public Optional<Boolean> isTest​(Path path)
                         throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: TestDetector
        Decides for provided compilationUnit whether it is a test source file. If a Boolean is returned, it determines surely whether the unit is a test or not. Alternatively, an empty Optional is returned, indicating that no sure decision about the file can be made by this detector.

        Detectors will usually always return the same Boolean value if they make a decision. This means that a detector will usually only decide whether a file is surely or is surely not a test source file, but not both.

        Specified by:
        isTest in interface TestDetector
        Parameters:
        path - The path to a java file to check.
        Returns:
        An optional of Boolean.TRUE only if compilationUnit is a test, an optional of Boolean.FALSE only if CompilationUnit is not a test, an empty optional if no sure decision can be made.
        Throws:
        IOException - If reading the compilationUnit fails.

      • mayReturnFalse

        public boolean mayReturnFalse()
        Description copied from interface: TestDetector
        Indicates whether this detector’s #isTest(ICompilationUnit) method may return an optional of Boolean.FALSE.

        This method is used to optimise performance when evaluating test detectors. Its default implementation always returns true.

        Specified by:
        mayReturnFalse in interface TestDetector
        Returns:
        false iff #isTestSourceFile(Path) will never return an optional of Boolean.FALSE.
